game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: Rumors say that a powerful artifact is buried within an old ruin. Locate it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a rare enchanted weapon.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins.
task.description: Talk to villagers near the forest for any clues about the ruin's location.
A fearsome creature guards the artifact. You must defeat it to proceed.
